words.id: Alif Lam Ra'||kitab||Aku turunkan kepadanya||kepadamu||keluar||manusia||dari||gelap||ke||cahaya||dengan izin||Tuhan mereka||kepada||jalan||Maha Kuasa||Maha Terpuji
words.en: Alif Laam Ra||A Book||which We have revealed||to you||so that you may bring out||the mankind||from||the darkness[es]||to||the light||by the permission||(of) their Lord||to||the Path||(of) the All-Mighty||the Praiseworthy

translations.text: Alif-Laaam-Raa; Kitaabun anzalnaahu ilaika litukhrijan naasa minaz zulumaati ilan noori bi-izni Rabbihim ilaa siraatil Azeezil Hameed

words.id: Allah||yang||bagiNya||apa||di||langit(jamak)||dan apa||di||bumi||dan kecelakaan||bagi orang-orang kafir||dari||siksaan||sangat pedih
words.en: Allah||(is) the One||to Him (belongs)||whatever||(is) in||the heavens||and whatever||(is) in||the earth||And woe||to the disbelievers||from||the punishment||severe

translations.text: Allaahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fill ard; Wa-wailul lilkaafireena min azaabin shadeed

words.id: orang-orang yang||lebih menyukai||kehidupan||dunia||atas||akhirat||dan mereka menghalang-halangi||dari||jalan||Allah||dan mereka menginginkannya||bengkok||mereka itu||dalam||kesesatan||jauh
words.en: Those who||love more||the life||(of) the world||than||the Hereafter||and hinder||from||(the) Path||(of) Allah||and seek in it||crookedness||those||[in]||(are) far astray||(are) far astray

translations.text: Allazeena yastahibboo-nal hayaatad dunyaa 'alal aakhirati Wa-yasuddoona an sabeelil laahi Wa-yabghoonahaa iwajaa; ulaaa'ika fee dalaalin ba'eed

words.id: dan tidak||Kami mengutus||dari||seorang Rasul||melainkan||dengan lisan/bahasa||kaumnya||agar ia menjelaskan||kepada mereka||maka/lalu menyesatkan||Allah||siapa||Dia kehendaki||dan Dia memberi petunjuk||siapa||Dia kehendaki||dan Dia||Maha Perkasa||Maha Bijaksana
words.en: And not||We sent||any||Messenger||except||with the language||(of) his people||so that he might make clear||for them||Then lets go astray||Allah||whom||He wills||and guides||whom||He wills||And He||(is) the All-Mighty||the All-Wise

translations.text: Wa-maaa arsalnaa mir Rasoolin illaa bilisaani qawmihee liyubaiyina lahum fa-yudillul laahu mai yashaaa'u Wa-yahdee mai yashaaa'; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||Kami telah mengutus||Musa||dengan ayat-ayat Kami||agar||keluarkanlah||kaummu||dari||kegelapan||kepada||cahaya terang||dan ingatkanlah mereka||dengan hari-hari||Allah||sesungguhnya||pada||yang demikian||sungguh tanda-tanda||bagi tiap-tiap||orang yang sabar||yang banyak bersyukur
words.en: And verily||We sent||Musa||with Our Signs||that||Bring out||your people||from||the darkness[es]||to||the light||And remind them||of the days||(of) Allah||Indeed||in||that||surely (are) the signs||for everyone||patient||and thankful

translations.text: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi-Aayaatinaa an akhrij qawmaka minaz zulumaati ilan noori Wa-zak-kirhum bi-ayyaamil laah; inna fee zaalika la-aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor

words.id: dan ketika||berkata||Musa||kepada kaumnya||ingatlah||nikmat||Allah||atas kalian||ketika||Dia menyelamatkan kamu||dari||keluarga/pengikut||Fir'aun||mereka menimpakan kalian||seburuk-buruk||siksaan||dan mereka menyembelih||anak-anak laki-laki kalian||dan mereka membiarkan hidup||anak-anak perempuanmu||dan pada||yang demikian itu||cobaan||dari||Tuhan kalian||yang besar
words.en: And when||said||Musa||to his people||Remember||(the) Favor of Allah||(the) Favor of Allah||upon you||when||He saved you||from||(the) people||(of) Firaun||they were afflicting you||(with) evil||torment||and were slaughtering||your sons||and letting live||your women||And in||that||(was) a trial||from||your Lord||great

translations.text: Wa-iz qaala Moosaa liqawmihiz kuroo ni'matal laahi alaikum iz anjaakum min Aali Fir'awna yasoomoo-nakum sooo'al azaabi Wa-yuzabbihoona abnaaa'akum Wa-yastahyoona nisaaa'akum; Wa-fee zaalikum balaaa'un mir Rabbikum 'azeem

words.id: ketika||memaklumkan||Tuhan kalian||sesungguhnya jika||kamu bersyukur||pasti Aku akan menambahkan kepadamu||dan sesungguhnya jika||kamu mengingkari||sesungguhnya||azabKu||sungguh sangat keras/pedih
words.en: And when||proclaimed||your Lord||If||you are thankful||surely I will increase you||but if||you are ungrateful||indeed||My punishment||(is) surely severe

translations.text: Wa-iz ta-azzana Rabbukum la'in shakartum la-azeedannakum Wa-la'in kafartum inna 'azaabee lashadeed

words.id: dan berkata||Musa||jika||kamu  mengingkari||kamu||dan orang||di||bumi||semuanya||maka sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Kaya||Maha Tetap
words.en: And said||Musa||If||you disbelieve||you||and whoever||(is) in||the earth||all||then indeed||Allah||certainly (is) Free of need||Praiseworthy

translations.text: Wa-qaala Moosaaa in takfurooo antum Wa-man fil ardi jamee'an fa-innal laaha la-Ghaniyyun Hameed

words.id: apakah tidak/belum||datang kepadamu||berita||orang-orang yang||dari||sebelum kalian||kaum||Nuh||dan 'Ad||dan Samud||dan orang-orang yang||dari||sesudah mereka||tidak||mengetahui mereka||selain||Allah||telah datang kepada mereka||Rasul-Rasul mereka||dengan bukti-bukti nyata||lalu mereka menutupkan||tangan mereka||ke dalam||mulut mereka||dan mereka berkata||sesungguhnya kami||kami mengingkari||dengan/terhadap apa||kamu disuruh/diutus||dengannya||dan sesungguhnya kami||sungguh dalam||keragu-raguan||terhadap apa||kamu menyeru kami||kepadanya||menggelisahkan

translations.text: Alam ya'tikum naba'ul lazeena min qablikum qawmi Noohinw Wa-'Aadinw Wa-Samood, wallazeena mim ba'dihim; laa ya'lamuhum illallaah; jaaa'at hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati faraddooo aydiyahum feee afwaahihim Wa-qaalooo innaa kafarnaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee Wa-innaa lafee shakkim mimmaa tad'oonanaaa ilaihi mureeb

words.id: berkata||Rasul-Rasul mereka||apakah terhadap||Allah||keragu-raguan||Pencipta||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||Dia menyeru kamu||untuk memberi ampunan||bagi kalian||dari||dosa-dosamu||dan Dia menangguhkan kamu||sampai||waktu||ditentukan||mereka berkata||tidak lain||kamu||hanyalah||manusia||seperti kami||kamu menghendaki||akan||kamu menghalang-halangi kami||dari apa||adalah||menyembah||nenek moyang kami||karena itu datangkan kepada kami||dengan bukti||yang nyata

translations.text: Qaalat Rusuluhum afil laahi shakkun faatiris samaawaati wal-ardi yad'ookum liyaghfira lakum min zunoobikum Wa-yu'akhirakum ilaaa ajalin musammaa; qaaloo in antum illaa basharum mislunaa tureedoona an tasuddoonaa 'ammaa kaana ya'budu aabaaa'unaa fa'toonaa bi-sultaanin mubeen

words.id: berkata||kepada mereka||Rasul-Rasul  mereka||jika||kami||hanyalah||manusia||seperti kamu||akan tetapi||Allah||memberi karunia||atas/kepada||siapa||Dia kehendaki||dari/diantara||hamba-hambaNya||dan tidaklah||adalah||bagi kami||akan||mendatangkan kepadamu||dengan bukti||melainkan||dengan izin||Allah||dan atas/kepada||Allah||maka hendaknya bertawakkal||orang-orang yang beriman
words.en: Said||to them||their Messengers||Not||we (are)||but||a human||like you||but||Allah||bestows His Grace||on||whom||He wills||of||His slaves||And not||is||for us||that||we bring you||an authority||except||by the permission of Allah||by the permission of Allah||And upon||Allah||so let put (their) trust||the believers

translations.text: Qaalat lahum Rusuluhum in nahnu illaa basharum mislukum Wa-laakinnal laaha yamunnu 'alaa maien yashaaa'u min ibaadihee Wa-maa kaana lanaaa an na'tiyakum bisul-taanin illaa bi-iznil laah; Wa-'alal laahi falyatawakkalil mu'minoon

words.id: dan mengapa||kami||tidak akan||kami bertawakkal||atas||Allah||dan/padahal sesungguhnya||Dia telah memberi petunjuk||jalan kami||dan sungguh kami akan bersabar||atas||apa||kamu menyakiti kami||dan atas/kepada||Allah||hendaknya bertawakkal/berserah diri||orang-orang yang bertawakkal
words.en: And what||(is) for us||that not||we put our trust||upon||Allah||while certainly||He has guided us||to our ways||And surely we will bear with patience||on||what||harm you may cause us||And upon||Allah||so let put (their) trust||the ones who put (their) trust

translations.text: Wa-maa lanaa allaa natawakkala 'alal laahi Wa-qad hadaanaa subulanaa; Wa-lanasbiranna 'alaa maaa aazaitumoonaa; Wa-'alal laahi falyatawakkalil mutawakkiloon

words.id: dan berkata||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||kepada Rasul-Rasul mereka||sungguh kami akan mengusir kamu||dari||bumi/negeri kami||atau||kamu akan kembali||dalam/pada||agama kami||maka wahyukan||kepada mereka||Tuhan mereka||sungguh Kami akan membinasakan||orang-orang yang zalim
words.en: And said||those who||disbelieved||to their Messengers||Surely we will drive you out||of||our land||or||surely you should return||to||our religion||So inspired||to them||their Lord||We will surely destroy||the wrongdoers

translations.text: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo li-Rusulihim lanukhrijanna-kum min aardinaaa aw la-ta'oodunna fee millatinaa fa-awhaaa ilaihim Rabbuhum lanuhlikannaz zaalimeen

words.id: dan sungguh Kami akan menempatkan kamu||bumi/negeri||dari||sesudah mereka||demikian itu||bagi orang||takut||hadiratKu||dan takut||ancamanKu
words.en: And surely We will make you dwell||(in) the land||after them||after them||That||(is) for whoever||fears||standing before Me||and fears||My Threat

translations.text: Wa-lanuskinan-nakumul arda min ba'dihim; zaalika liman khaafa maqaamee Wa-khaafa wa'eed

words.id: dan mereka mohon kemenangan||dan binasalah||semua||orang yang sewenang-wenang||keras kepala
words.en: And they sought victory||and disappointed||every||tyrant||obstinate

translations.text: Wastaftahoo Wa-khaaba kullu jabbaarin 'aneed

words.id: dari||belakangnya||jahanam||dan dia akan diberi minum||dari/dengan||air||nanah
words.en: Ahead of him||Ahead of him||(is) Hell||and he will be made to drink||of||water||purulent

translations.text: Minw waraaa'ihee jahannamu Wa-yusqaa min maaa'in sadeed

words.id: dia menghirupnya||dan tidak||hampir||dia menelannya||dan datang kepadanya||maut/kematian||dari||segenap||tempat/penjuru||dan tidaklah||dia||dengan yang mati||dan dari||belakangnya||azab||keras/berat

translations.text: Yatajarra'uhoo Wa-laa yakaadu yuseeghuhoo Wa-ya'teehil mawtu min kulli makaaninw Wa-maa huwa bimaiyitinw Wa-minw waraaa'ihee 'azaabun ghaleez

words.id: perumpamaan||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||dengan/kepada Tuhan mereka||amalan-amalan mereka||seperti abu||meniup keras||dengannya||angin||pada||hari||musim angin kencang||tidak||mereka dapat||dari pada||mereka usahakan||atas||sesuatu/sedikitpun||demikian itu||dia/adalah||kesesatan||yang jauh

translations.text: Masalul lazeena kafaroo bi-Rabbihim; a'maaluhum karamaadinish taddat bihir reehu fee yawmin aasifin; laa yaqdiroona mimmaa kasaboo 'alaa shai'; zaalika huwad dalaalul ba'eed

words.id: tidakkah||kamu perhatikan||bahwa sesungguhnya||Allah||menciptakan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dengan benar||jika||Dia  menghendaki||Dia menghilangkan/membinasakan kamu||dan dia mendatangkan/mengganti||dengan makhluk||yang baru
words.en: Do not||you see||that||Allah||created||the heavens||and the earth||in truth||If||He wills||He can remove you||and bring||a creation||new

translations.text: Alam tara annal laaha khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqq; iny yasha yuzhibkum Wa-ya'ti bikhalqin jadeed

words.id: dan tidak||demikian itu||atas/bagi||Allah||dengan sukar/berat
words.en: And not||(is) that||on||Allah||great

translations.text: Wa-maa zaalika 'alal laahi bi-'azeez

words.en: And they will come forth||before Allah||all together||then will say||the weak||to those who||were arrogant||Indeed, we||we were||your||followers||so can||you (be)||the one who avails||us||from||(the) punishment||(of) Allah||anything||anything||They will say||If||Allah had guided us||Allah had guided us||surely we would have guided you||(It is) same||for us||whether we show intolerance||or||we are patient||not||(is) for us||any||place of escape

translations.text: Wa-barazoo lillaahi jamee'an faqaalad du'afaaa'u lil-lazeenas takbarooo innaa kunnaa lakum taba'an fahal antum mughnoona 'annaa min azaabil laahi min shai'; qaaloo law hadaanal laahu la-hadaynaakum sawaaa'un alainaaa ajazi'naa am sabarnaa maa lanaa min mahees

translations.text: Wa-qaalash Shaitaanu lammaa qudiyal amru innal laaha wa'adakum wa'dal haqqi Wa-wa'attukum fa-akhlaftukum Wa-maa kaana liya alaikum min sultaanin illaaa an da'awtukum fastajabtum lee falaa taloomoonee Wa-loomooo anfusakum maaa ana bimusrikhikum Wa-maaa antum bimusrikhiyya innee kafartu bimaaa ashraktumooni min qabl; innaz zaalimeena lahum azaabun aleem

translations.text: Wa-udkhilal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa bi-izni Rabbihim tahiyyatuhum feeha salaam

words.id: tidakkah||kamu perhatikan||bagaimana||membuat||Allah||perumpamaan||kalimat||yang baik||seperti pohon||yang baik||akarnya||kokoh||dan cabangnya||di||langit
words.en: Do not||you see||how||Allah sets forth||Allah sets forth||the example||a word||good||(is) like a tree||good||its root||(is) firm||and its branches||(are) in||the sky

translations.text: Alam tara kaifa darabal laahu masalan kalimatan taiyibatan kashajaratin taiyibatin asluhaa saabitunw Wa-far'uhaa fis samaaa'

words.id: (pohon itu)memberikan||makanannya/buahnya||setiap||masa/musim||dengan ijin||Tuhannya||dan membuat||Allah||perumpamaan-perumpamaan||bagi manusia||agar mereka||mereka ingat/mengambil pelajaran
words.en: Giving||its fruit||all||time||by the permission||of its Lord||And Allah sets forth||And Allah sets forth||the examples||for mankind||so that they may||remember

translations.text: Tu'teee ukulahaa kulla heenim bi-izni Rabbihaa; Wa-yadribul laahul amsaala linnaasi la'allahum yatazak-karoon

words.id: dan perumpamaan||kalimat||jelek||seperti pohon||jelek||dicabut||dari||atas permukaan||bumi||tidak ada||baginya||dari||ketetapan/tegak
words.en: And (the) example||(of) a word||evil||(is) like a tree||evil||uprooted||from||the surface||(of) the earth||not||for it||(is) any||stability

translations.text: Wa-masalu kalimatin khabeesatin kashajaratin khabee-satinij tussat min fawqil ardi maa lahaa min qaraar

words.id: meneguhkan||Allah||orang-orang yang||beriman||dengan ucapan||tetap teguh||dalam||kehidupan||dunia||dan di||akhirat||dan menyesatkan||Allah||orang-orang yang zalim||dan berbuat||Allah||apa||Dia kehendaki
words.en: Allah keeps firm||Allah keeps firm||those who||believe||with the firm word||with the firm word||in||the life||(of) the world||and in||the Hereafter||And Allah lets go astray||And Allah lets go astray||the wrongdoers||And Allah does||And Allah does||what||He wills

translations.text: Yusabbitul laahul lazeena aamanoo bilqawlis saabiti fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-fil Aakhirati Wa-yudillul laahuz zaalimeen; Wa-yaf'alul laahu maa yashaaa'

words.id: tidakkah||kamu perhatikan||kepada||orang-orang yang||mereka menukar||nikmat||Allah||kekafiran||dan mereka menempatkan||kaum mereka||tempat/rumah||kebinasaan
words.en: Have not||you seen||[to]||those who||(have) changed||(the) Favor||(of) Allah||(for) disbelief||and they led||their people||(to the) house||(of) destruction

translations.text: Alam tara ilal lazeena baddaloo ni'matal laahi kufranw Wa-ahalloo qawmahum daaral bawaar

words.id: neraka jahanam||mereka memasukinya||dan seburuk-buruk||tempat ketetapan/kediaman
words.en: Hell||(in) it they will burn||and a wretched||place to settle

translations.text: Jahannama yaslawnahaa Wa-bi'sal qaraar

words.id: dan mereka menjadikan||bagi Allah||sekutu-sekutu||supaya mereka menyesatkan||dari||jalanNya||katakanlah||bersenang-senanglah kamu||maka sesungguhnya||tempat kembalimu||kepada||neraka
words.en: And they set up||to Allah||equals||so that they mislead||from||His Path||Say||Enjoy||but indeed||your destination||(is) to||the Fire

translations.text: Wa-ja'aloo lillaahi andaadal liyudilloo 'an sabeelih; qul tamatta'oo fa-innaa maseerakum ilan Naar

words.id: katakanlah||kepada hamba-hambaKu||orang-orang yang||beriman||mereka mendirikan||sholat||dan mereka nafkahkan||dari/sebagian apa||Kami rezkikan kepada mereka||tersembunyi||dan terang-terangan||dari||sebelum||bahwa||akan datang||hari||tidak||jual-beli||didalamnya||dan tidak||persahabatan
words.en: Say||to My slaves||those who||believe||(to) establish||the prayers||and (to) spend||from what||We have provided them||secretly||and publicly||before||before||[that]||comes||a Day||not||any trade||in it||and not||any friendship

translations.text: Qul li'ibaadiyal lazeena aamanoo yuqeemus Salaata Wa-yunfiqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum sirranw Wa-'alaaniyatam min qabli any yaatiya Yawmul laa bai'un feehi Wa-laa khilaal

words.id: Allah||yang||menciptakan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dan Dia menurunkan||dari||langit||air/hujan||lalu Dia mengeluarkan||dengannya||dari||buah-buahan||rizki||bagi kalian||dan Dia menundukkan||bagi kalian||bahtera||untuk berlayar/berjalan||di||lautan||dengan perintahNya||dan Dia menundukan||bagi kalian||sungai-sungai
words.en: Allah||(is) the One Who||created||the heavens||and the earth||and sent down||from||the sky||water||then brought forth||from it||of||the fruits||(as) a provision||for you||and subjected||for you||the ships||so that they may sail||in||the sea||by His command||and subjected||for you||the rivers

translations.text: Allaahul lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an faakhraja bihee minas samaraati rizqal lakum Wa-sakhkhara lakumul fulka litajriya fil bahri bi-amrihee Wa-sakhkhara lakumul anhaar

words.en: And He subjected||for you||the sun||and the moon||both constantly pursuing their courses||and subjected||for you||the night||and the day

translations.text: Wa-sakhkhara lakumush shamsa walqamara daaa'ibaini Wa-sakhkhara lakumul laila wannahaar

translations.text: Wa-aataakum min kulli maa sa-altumooh; Wa-in ta'uddoo ni'matal laahi laa tuhsoohaa; innal insaana lazaloo-mun kaffaar

words.en: And when||said||Ibrahim||My Lord!||Make||this||city||safe||and keep me away||and my sons||that||we worship||the idols

translations.text: Wa-iz qaala ibraaheemu Rabbij 'al haazal balada aaminanw wajnubnee Wa-baniyya an na'budal asnaam

words.id: ya Tuhanku||sesungguhnya mereka||mereka telah menyesatkan||kebanyakan||dari||manusia||maka barangsiapa||mengikuti aku||maka sesungguhnya dia||dariku||dan barang siapa||mendurhakai aku||maka sesungguhnya Engkau||Maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang

translations.text: Rabbi innahunna adlalna kaseeram minan naasi faman tabi'anee fa-innahoo minnee Wa-man 'asaanee fa-innaka Ghafoorur Raheem

translations.text: Rabbanaaa inneee askantu min zurriyyatee biwaadin ghairi zee zar'in inda Baitikal Muharrami Rabbanaa liyuqeemus Salaata faj'al af'idatam minan naasi tahweee ilaihim warzuqhum minas samaraati la'allahum yashkuroon

words.en: Our Lord!||Indeed You||You know||what||we conceal||and what||we proclaim||And not||(is) hidden||from||Allah||any||thing||in||the earth||and not||in||the heaven

translations.text: Rabbanaaa innaka ta'lamu maa nukhfee Wa-maa nu'lin; Wa-maa yakhfaa 'alal laahi min shai'in fil ardi Wa-laa fis samaaa'

translations.text: Alhamdu lillaahil lazee wahaba lee 'alal kibari ismaa'eela Wa-ishaaq; inna Rabbee lasamee'ud du'aaa

words.en: Our Lord!||Forgive||me||and my parents||and the believers||(on) the Day||will (be) established||the account

translations.text: Rabbanagh fir lee Wa-liwaalidaiya Wa-lilmu'mineena Yawma yaqoomul hisaab

translations.text: Wa-laa tahsabannal laaha ghaafilan 'ammaa ya'maluz zaalimoon; innamaa yu'akh-khiruhum li-Yawmin tashkhasu feehil absaar

translations.text: Muhti'eena muqni'ee ru'oosihim laa yartaddu ilaihim tarfuhum Wa-af'idatuhum hawaaa'

translations.text: Wa-anzirin naasa Yawma yaateehimul 'azaabu fa-yaqoolul lazeena zalamoo Rabbanaaa akhkhirnaaa ilaaa ajalin qareebin nujib da'wataka Wa-nattabi-'ir Rusul; awalam takoonooo aqsamtum min qablu maa lakum min zawaal

words.en: And you dwelt||in||the dwellings||(of) those who||wronged||themselves||and it had become clear||to you||how||We dealt||with them||and We put forth||for you||the examples

translations.text: Wa-sakantum fee masaakinil lazeena zalamooo anfusahum Wa-tabaiyana lakum kaifa fa'alnaa bihim Wa-darabnaa lakumul amsaal

translations.text: Wa-qad makaroo makrahum Wa-'indal laahi makruhum Wa-in kaana makruhum litazoola minhul jibaal

translations.text: Liyajziyal laahu kulla nafsim maa kasabat; innal laaha saree'ul hisaab
